channel.title: Examples on Security365 Docs
channel.description: Recent content in Examples on Security365 Docs

item.title: Return small HTML page
item.description: Deliver an HTML page from an HTML string directly inside the Worker script.

item.title: Return JSON
item.description: Return JSON directly from a Worker script, useful for building APIs and middleware.

item.title: Fetch HTML
item.description: Send a request to a remote server, read HTML from the response, and serve that HTML.

item.title: Fetch JSON
item.description: Send a GET request and read in JSON from the response. Use to fetch external data.

item.title: Redirect
item.description: Redirect requests from one URL to another or from one set of URLs to another set.

item.title: Accessing the Cloudflare Object
item.description: Access custom Cloudflare properties and control how Cloudflare features are applied to every request.

item.title: Respond with another site
item.description: Respond to the Worker request with the response from another website (example.com in this example).

item.title: 103 Early Hints
item.description: Allow a client to request static assets while waiting for the HTML response.

item.title: A/B testing with same-URL direct access
item.description: Set up an A/B test by controlling what response is served based on cookies. This version supports passing the request through to test and control on the origin, bypassing random assignment.

item.title: Aggregate requests
item.description: Send two GET request to two urls and aggregates the responses into one response.
